siteMetadata.title: Tech Blog by Murtaza Bagwala
siteMetadata.subtitle: A place where I love to share my opinions and experiences.

frontmatter.title: Rails 7 adds caching? and uncachable! helper
frontmatter.description: Starting with Rails 7, we can add caching? helper to check whether the current code path is being cached and uncacheable! helper to avoid fragment caching.
